TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IContainItemStorage

Docs.summary: Provides a property bag implementation for item panels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> classes implement this interface so that the items panel can store the state of its items.
